import { useFormik } from "formik"; import { Box, Button, FormControl, FormErrorMessage, FormLabel, Heading, Input, Select, Textarea, VStack, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; // import './BookingForm.css'; const BookingForm = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { firstName: '', email: '', type: '', comment: '' }, onSubmit: (values) => { submit('',values); }, validationSchema: Yup.object({ firstName: Yup.string().required('Required'), email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email').required('Required'), type: '', comment: Yup.string().min(25, 'Must be at least 25 characters').required('Required'), }), }); return (
